alert.note: Alert for Hempstead; Howard; Little River; Nevada; Sevier (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 10:12PM CDT until June 17 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Little River County in southwestern Arkansas... Hempstead County in southwestern Arkansas... Southeastern Sevier County in southwestern Arkansas... Southeastern Howard County in southwestern Arkansas... Southwestern Nevada County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1011 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Saratoga, or 10 miles south of Mineral Springs, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hope, Prescott, Emmet, Perrytown, Tollette, Fulton, Washington, Bodcaw, Saratoga, McNab, Patmos, Oakhaven, Bright Star, Sutton, Millwood, Laneburg and Red Bluff. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Hempstead; Howard; Little River; Nevada; Sevier
